item.title: A Mississippi monkey sanctuary helps veterans with PTSD find peace
item.description: An Army veteran finds peace through a unique bond with a spider monkey named Louie

item.title: Texas Democrats arrive in Illinois to block vote back home on redrawn House maps sought by Trump
item.description: Texas Democrats have left the state in an attempt to prevent the state House from holding a vote Monday on new congressional maps that Republicans hop...

item.title: Whale dies after collision with small boat off Jersey shore
item.description: A minke whale died off the New Jersey shore after colliding with a small boat.

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Saturday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Saturday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 06-18-34-35-36, Powerball: 2

item.title: At this summer camp run by grandmas, kids learn cooking skills and life advice
item.description: At a summer camp in Fullerton, California, grandmas are in charge
